form.emailInfo: Providing an email address allows you to recover your password later. Your email address will not be used for other purposes.

mentor.presenceCheckbox: Show actors when I am online
mentor.presenceInfo: Actors can see from your mentor card when you are online. Otherwise, actors see an estimate of when you were last online.

mentee.displayNameInfo: If you want to remain anonymous to mentors, enter a display name that does not identify you.

endDate.info: The absence mode will automatically end on this date.
endDate.title: Absence mode ends

absence.info: During absence mode, you cannot receive messages. Please specify the duration of your absence in your status message.
absence.title: Absence mode
